title: Pixel 3a not updating to Android 11
content:
I have a Google Pixel 3a and still I don't receive the Android 11 update (I am in Italy region). I have colleagues with Pixel 2 that received Android 11 but my device still have Android 10. The last security update is from 5 August. I know that I can install manually the update, but i prefer to do it automatically.
It's normal or maybe there is a problem? Thanks
